Account.description: External ID associated with the account.

TradingPermissions.description: One or more exchange access bundles specified by country or other grouping.

CommissionConfigs.description: One or more commission configuration settings (either for securities or commodities or both)

AllExchangeAccess.description: If a trading permission bundle would provide improper exchange access, then specify exactly a set of exchanges.

Capabilities.description: A set of capabilities will be inferred from the trading permissions. However, additional capabilities can be specified.

DVPInstructions.description: For IBExecution and/or IBPrime service, DVP instructions provide the clear-away trading permissions.

CommissionConfig.description: Commission Type (Possible values include Securities or Commodities)

AssetClass.description: An ACES asset class, aka financial instrument type.

TradingLimits.description: Various limits for the llimit tracking mechanism.

OrderQuantityLimit.description: Per asset class order quantity limit.

DayQuantityLimit.description: Per asset class day quantity limit.

AdvisorWrapFeesType.description: This is for BillingConfiguration and indicates whether other fees will be charged to the advisor account

highWaterMarkConfigHwma.description: Required if High Water Mark is set for PERCENTOFPROFIT.

highWaterMarkConfigHwmq.description: Required if High Water Mark is set for PERCENTOFPROFIT_QUARTER.

AutomatedWrapFeeDetailsType.description: This is the optional monthly invoice percentage cap. When provided, it limits the advisor quarterly invoice to a certain percentage of the client's Net Asset Value. Mutualy exclusive with PercentOfNLVCap. When used in combination with type.INVOICE_LIMIT_Q it implies both a percentage and absolute amount cap (whichever is reached first).

per_trade_markups.description: Required if the Automated Wrap Fee type is PERTRADE.

CommissionMarkupType.description: Specific markup in a commission schedule.

MarkupStaircaseType.description: A break in the markup staircase of a commission schedule.

InterestMarkupType.description: Interest Rate markups for a specific currency.

ExtPositionsTransfers.description: Details for transferring positions from a third party broker to IB using a specific transfer mechanism such as ACATS or ATON for one or more customer accounts at IB.

FeesTemplateBasedType.description: Fees template name previously created on Account Management.

ExtPositionsTransferType.description: Is used to indicate whether mutual funds are OK to be excluded from ACATS transfer.

PartialStockPositions.description: All information required to complete partial transfer of stock positions held in external accounts over to IB.

PartialStockPosition.description: Information required to complete partial transfer of a stock position held in external account over to IB.

PartialBondPositions.description: All information required to complete partial transfer of bond positions held in external accounts over to IB.

PartialBondPosition.description: Information required to complete partial transfer of a bond position held in external account over to IB.

PartialOptionPositions.description: All information required to complete partial transfer of option positions held in external accounts over to IB.

PartialOptionPosition.description: Information required to complete partial transfer of an option position held in external account over to IB.

PartialWarrantPositions.description: All information required to complete partial transfer of warrant positions held in external accounts over to IB.

PartialWarrantPosition.description: Information required to complete partial transfer of a warrant position held in external account over to IB.

PartialFundPositions.description: All information required to complete partial transfer of fund positions held in external accounts over to IB.

PartialFundPosition.description: Information required to complete partial transfer of a fund position held in external account over to IB.

PartialCashPositions.description: All information required to complete partial transfer of cash positions held in external accounts over to IB.

PartialCashPosition.description: Information required to complete partial transfer of a cash position held in external account over to IB.

DepositNotificationType.description: Customer Account at IB for which this Deposit Notification is being set. Only relevant for notifications sent as part of Account Management Requests for open IB accounts.

CheckDetailsType.description: Account Number of the customer at the Bank on which the check is drawn as noted on the check.

WireDetailsType.description: Reference Number or Payment ID of the Wire Transfer provided by the Bank.

ACHDetailsType.description: Name of the Bank from which the ACH transfer will originate.

IRADepositDetailsType.description: Type of the source IRA account, only required for rollover deposits. Rollover deposits currently restricted to be from Traditional, Roth and SEP IRA accounts only. Inherited IRA accounts may not be the source of a rollover deposit notification.

RecurringTransactionType.description: Customer Account at IB for which this recurring transaction is being set. Only relevant for instructions sent as part of Account Management Requests for open IB accounts.

ACHInstructionType.description: Account Number of the customer at the Bank.

IRAWithdrawalDetailsType.description: The tax rate for state withholding from the withdrawal. If not specified, implies customer indicates no withholding.

CustodianType.description: One individual or a legal entity that is the custodian for a UGMA / UTMA. Legal entities must detail one employee to be the signatory.

Application.description: Specifies whether the application was successfully processed or not.

Customer.description: Specify that the account is an independent account.

Organization.description: Details of a customer of type ORG.

AccountHolder.description: Details of a customer of type INDIVIDUAL.

JointHolders.description: Details of a customer of type JOINT.

Trust.description: Details of a customer of type TRUST.

IndividualIdentification.description: Required for legal Indian residents or citizens of India.

TaxResidencies.description: Required information due to FATCA changes: tax regulations require us to collect information about customer's tax residency and we may be obligated to share that information with the regulators.

W8BenE.description: One type of W8 is required if the beneficial owner is not a US entity.

W8IMY.description: One type of W8 is required if the beneficial owner is not a US entity.

WithholdingStatement.description: Withholding statement for the acct, to be used by QI Brokers.

IndividualApplicant.description: An individual who is the customer and beneficial owner of an account. Ownership and Title are fixed at 100% and Account Holder respectively and provided values will be ignored.

TaxInformation.description: Tax information required for individuals. This element is being deprecated, we suggest to use FATCA elements.

WithholdingStatement.description: Withholding statement for the acct, to be used by QI Brokers.

TaxInformation.description: Tax information required for individuals. This element is being deprecated, we suggest to use FATCA elements.

WithholdingStatement.description: Withholding statement for the acct, to be used by QI Brokers.

TrustApplicant.description: According to US IRS, for taxes purposes, the trust is classified as Complex, Single, Grantor os US Taxable?

TaxResidencies.description: Required information due to FATCA changes: tax regulations require us to collect information about customer's tax residency and we may be obligated to share that information with the regulators.

W8BenE.description: One type of W8 is required if the beneficial owner is not a US entity.

W8IMY.description: One type of W8 is required if the beneficial owner is not a US entity.

WithholdingStatement.description: Withholding statement for the acct, to be used by QI Brokers.

OrganizationIdentification.description: Indicates if the inforamtion is the translated version. It is used only when providing information in a different language and English. Default values is "false".

MailingAddress.description: Mailing address of the organization if different from the place of business. Required if flag indicating a different mailing address is set.

LegalEntityIdentification.description: Flag to indicate that the entity mailing address is the same as its place of business.

MailingAddress.description: Mailing address of the entity if different from the place of business. Required if flag indicating a different mailing address is set.

TrustIdentification.description: Indicates if the information is the translated version. It is used only when providing information in a different language and English. Default values is "false".

MailingAddress.description: Mailing address of the Trust if different from the official address. Required if flag indicating a different mailing address is set.

AssociatedEntities.description: One or more individuals or legal entities that are associated with the customer.

IRABeneficiariesType.description: Flag to indicate if the spouse is the primary beneficiary of the IRA account. Required for a married account holder. If spouse is not the primary beneficiary then a signed spousal consent is required.

AssociationTypeEntities.description: One or more individuals or legal entities with a specific association with the customer as defined by the declaring element.

TrusteesType.description: One or more individuals or legal entities that are the trustees of the Trust.

TrusteeIndividual.description: A individual that is the trustee of a trust. An individual trustee must must inform job title and occupation.

TrusteeEntityType.description: A legal entity that is the trustee of a trust. An entity trustee must detail an employee signatory.

FinancialInformation.description: Indicates if the inforamtion is the translated version. It is used only when providing information in a different language and English. Default values is "false".

InvestmentObjectives.description: Deprecated. Should be provided individually for each account being added for the customer using the InvestmentObjectives sub-element of an Account element.

AdditionalSourceOfIncomeType.description: The customer's additional source of income; optional for employed individuals; required for unemployed, retired, student, at-home trader and homemakers. The sum of percentages must be exactly 100%; each type of source of income should be mentioned only one.

SourceOfIncomeType.description: Additional source of income. Note: Source of Income will be deprecated from June 1, 2019 onwards.

SourcesOfWealthType.description: Customer's source of wealth; required for all account types. The sum of percentages must be exactly 100%; each type of source of wealth should be mentioned only one. Note: Source of Wealth will become mandatory from June 1, 2019 onwards.

InvestmentExperience.description: The customer's experience and knowledge with the various financial instruments required to qualify trading in those instruments.

AssetExperience.description: Trading experience and knowledge for a specific financial instrument.

AccreditedInvestorInformation.description: Our five accredited investor questions. See a printed application.

RegulatoryInformation.description: Indicates if the inforamtion is the translated version. It is used only when providing information in a different language and English. Default values is "false".

RegulatoryDetail.description: Specific questions about regulatory issues. An enumeration of question codes will be declared. See a paper application.

SelfRegulatedMembershipType.description: List of exchanges and self regulated organizations the customer is a member of.

AffiliationDetailsType.description: Indicates if IB should send duplicated statements to customers. For those incldued on FINRA Rule 3210 or equivalent on his/her jurisdiction, the expected answer is true, as they need to submit one copy to his/her employer compliance office.

affiliation_relationship.description: Relationship with the account holder. It would be self, spouse, partner, child or the best way to describe the case.

company_phone.description: Preferably the phone number of the company's Compliance department.

company_email_address.description: Preferably the email address of the company's Compliance department.

FinancialOrgType.description: Specific questions about financial org types. See a paper application.

RegulatedMembership.description: We must know of the membership in any regulated organizations. E.g. an NYSE or NASD member.

RegulatorCountry.description: Preferrably use ISO codes for countries instead of names.

AssociatedIndividual.description: An individual who is associated with this customer and qualification of the association.

allOf.description: Indicates if the Associated Individual is an Authorized Person [ The person signing and completing the application ] . Defualt value is False.

PrimaryTrader.description: The individual who will be associated with the trading session for the Organization's account.

ControllingOfficer.description: The CEO of the customer's organization.

IRAPrimaryBeneficiary.description: The individual who is the primary beneficiary of the IRA account. Here the Ownership denotes the beneficiary's share.

IRAPrimaryBeneficiaryEntity.description: The Legal Entity that is the primary beneficiary of the IRA account. Here the Ownership denotes the beneficiary's share.

Executor.description: Details of the Trustee/Executor where the beneficiary is a Trust. Only considered if the beneficiary specified is a Trust, then too, optional. Only the name is required, address may optionally be provided.

ExecutionDate.description: Date of execution of the Trust or Will.

ArticleOfWill.description: Article of the Will. Required for Trust Beneficiaries.

IRAContingentBeneficiary.description: The individual who is the contingent beneficiary of the IRA account. Here the Ownership denotes the beneficiary's share.

IRAContingentBeneficiaryEntity.description: The Legal Entity that is the contingent beneficiary of the IRA account. Here the Ownership denotes the beneficiary's share.

Executor.description: Details of the Trustee/Executor where the beneficiary is a Trust. Only considered if the beneficiary specified is a Trust, then too, optional. Only the name is required, address may optionally be provided.

ExecutionDate.description: Date of execution of the Trust or Will.

ArticleOfWill.description: Article of the Will. Required for Trust Beneficiaries.

IRADecedent.description: The deceased individual from whom the IRA account is being inherited. Required information for a decedent is the name, date of birth, date of death, SSN and the inheritor type.

AssociatedEntity.description: A legal entity which is associated with this customer and qualification of the association.

Individual.description: Indicates if the inforamtion is the translated version. It is used only when providing information in a different language and English. Default values is "false".

CountryOfBirth.description: Preferrably use ISO codes for countries instead of names.

MaritalStatus.description: Required for individuals associated with Individual or Joint accounts.

NumDependents.description: Required for individuals associated with Individual or Joint accounts.

EmploymentType.description: Required for individuals associated with Individual or Joint accounts.

EmploymentDetails.description: Required for individuals associated with Individual or Joint accounts that specify Employed or Self-employed as theyir employment type.

EmployeeTitle.description: Job title of the individual at his employer. Required for individuals associated with Organization accounts.

TaxResidencies.description: Required information due to FATCA changes: tax regulations require us to collect information about customer's tax residency and we may be obligated to share that information with the regulators.

W9.description: Required for a US citizen or US person including resident alien individual.

W8Ben.description: Required if the beneficial owner is not a US person.

CRS.description: Required if the beneficial owner is part of IB-UK entity.

LegalEntity.description: Indicates if the inforamtion is the translated version. It is used only when providing information in a different language and English. Default values is "false".

Location.description: Deprecated. Entity's primary address must be noted via its place of business in the identification element.

TaxResidencies.description: Required information due to FATCA changes: tax regulations require us to collect information about customer's tax residency and we may be obligated to share that information with the regulators.

Ownership.description: Defines ownership with a specified percentage.

Title.description: Nature of association of an individual or entity with the customer account.

PhoneInfo.description: Preferrably use ISO codes for countries instead of names.

PhonesList.description: Direct contact details for an individual via Phone or Fax.

AccountSupportType.description: Account Support classifies organizations in 4 categories of trading intentions.

SimpleLegalEntityType.description: A legal entity is anything other than an individual. A simple legal entity being asscoiated with an account in tertiary capacity such as IRA beneficiary where the entity's name is the only required piece of information.

PrimaryContributorType.description: Family vehicle accts must have a primary contributor

AdministratorType.description: Family vehicle accts must have a primary contributor

AdministratorContactPersonType.description: Family vehicle accts must have a primary contributor

DVPInstruction.description: A DVP instruction specifies the settlement information for clear-away trading.

Documents.description: List of documents that were processed by ECA.

Document.description: Indicates whether the document was processed or not. Displays detailed error message in case document is not successfully processed.

Security.description: For customer identification by telephone. challenge/response, aka hint/phrase, aka question/answer

Address.description: Preferrably use ISO codes for countries instead of names.

UserNamePrefix_Type.description: Prefix used to generate a username.

DOB.description: A date specifically for a birthday.

UserPrivilege.description: A user is privileged for a specified account.

MDServicesType.description: List of Market Data Services the user is requesting subscription to.

WithholdingStatementsType.description: Timestamp of the signature using ISO 8601 Basic Format YYYYMMDDhhmmss and considering NY time (EST/EDT).

WithholdingStatementType.description: Tax rate applicable to US ECI income; mandatory when the account is flow-through. All rates can be entered with up to 2 digits of precision.

Customer_Type.description: ACES Enumeration. Note: IRA is deprecated

CountryCode_Type.description: Please refer to ISO 3166-1 for 3-letter country codes (http://www.iso.org)

StateCode_Type.description: Please refer to ISO 3166-1? for 2-letter state codes (http://www.iso.org)

RegulatoryIssueCode_Type.description: Deprecated. Keeping this for backward compatibility.

Deposit_Type.description: ACES enumeration, SKIP_DEPOSIT is for clients who will fund later, after the account is opened

WealthSource_Type.description: ACES enumeration Values with the prefix SOW-IND should be used with Individual/Joint accounts. Values with the prefix SOW-ORG should be used with Org/Trust accounts.

RelationshipEnum.description: List of possible relationships between entities and accounts.

W8BENE_Box11_Type.description: W-8BEN-E Box 11 - Chapter 4 Status (FATCA status) of disregarded entity or branch receiving payment

W8IMY_Box11_Type.description: W-8IMY Box 11 - Chapter 4 Status (FATCA status) of disregarded entity or branch receiving payment

US_TIN_Type.description: W-8IMY Box 8 - Part 1 - Item 8 - US Taxpayer Identification Number Type

USTaxPurposeType.description: Corporation - C Partnership - P Disregarded Entity - E

FinancialOrgCodeType.description: Org is a foreign bank - 2 Org is a licensed securities broker or dealer - 3 Org is a licensed futures commission merchant - 5 Org is a mutual fund, hedge fund, private equity - 21 Org is a licensed forex dealer - 22 Org is a licensed money transmitter -23 Org is an employee benefit plan regulated under ERISA - 25 Org is a US federally regulated or state regulated bank -31 Org is a US registered swap dealer - 33 Org is a US registered major swap participant - 34 Org is an insuarance company regulated by a US state - 35 Org is a nonUS insurance company regulated outside of the US - 36 Org is a department or agency of the US - 37 Org is a licensed advisor or investment manager for securities, futures, or forex trading - 38

PricingStructureType.description: Used only for brokers; it indicates the type of price structure

DesignationType.description: It indicates the desigation of Controlling Person for CRS Tax Reporting

ExplanationType.description: Explanation for not providing either TIN or Foreign Tax Id: 1. [US_TIN] Account holder possesses US TIN; it will be added to W8 Form. 2. [TIN_NOT_DISCLOSED] Country issues TIN; however, account holder is exempt from disclosing TIN under laws of the country. 3. [TIN_NOT_REQUIRED] Account holder is not legally required to obtain TIN. 4. [TIN_NOT_ISSUED] Country does not issue TIN.

AcctMgmtRequests.description: A set of account management function requests for accounts belonging to a specific external entity. Account specified on any request must already be open.

DocumentSubmissionType.description: Indicated if the file contains translated information from another language to English. This attribute is used only when input_language is different than "en". Default is "false"

DuplicateAcctRequest.description: Number of duplicate accounts required, if not provided defaults to one.

LinkDuplicateAccount.description: Flag to indicate if the account owner will activelly trade. For advisor clients, the default value is false.

AddTradingPermissions.description: IB Account ID of the Advisor/Broker Client account for which Trading Permissions will be added.

RemoveTradingPermissions.description: IB Account ID of the Advisor/Broker Client account for which Trading Permissions will be removed.

ChangeMarginType.description: New margin type for the account

ChangeFinancialInformation.description: IB Account ID of the Advisor/Broker Client account for which Financial Information will be changed

NewFinancialInformation.description: Changed financial information for the account

EnrollInSYEP.description: IB Account ID of the Advisor/Broker Client account for which request to Enroll in SYEP Program will be submitted.

LeaveSYEP.description: IB Account ID of the Advisor/Broker Client account for which request to leave SYEP Program will be submitted.

AddMiFIRData.description: Nature of association of an individual or entity with the customer account.

UpdateCredentials.description: User Name of Advisor/Broker Client account for which Account Credentials will be updated.

UpdatePassword.description: Verification token sent to Email Address or Phone Number associated with the Account

UpdateEmail.description: Verification token sent to Updated Email Address

UpdatePhone.description: Verification token sent to Updated Mobile Phone

AllocateVAN.description: Two digit Country code from where Wire Transfer Deposit will originate.

ProcessDocumentsType.description: Indicated if the file contains translated information from another language to English. This attribute is used only when input_language is different than "en". Default is "false"

GetJavaScript.description: The name of the method. Should be getCodeWithPublicKey

YodleeSession.description: The IB account ID. Only needed for finishYodlee.

InformationChange.description: Indicates the IB account ID to apply the changes

AddEntity.description: Information about a new entity (individual or legal) to be associated to the account; relationship is mandatory.

UpdateEntity.description: Identifier for the entity at IB.

DeleteEntity.description: Identifier for the entity at IB.

AddRelationship.description: Ownership ppercentage is value between 1 and 100; the sum of all entities should be 100.

DeleteRelationship.description: Relationship name, based on a list of possible values.

Organization.description: An organization which is the customer and beneficial owner of an account.

Trust.description: A Trust which is the customer and beneficial owner of an account.

Applications.description: A set of applications belonging to a specific external entity.

AllDVPInstructions.description: For IBExecution and/or IBPrime service, DVP instructions provide the clear-away trading permissions.

Additions.description: A set of customer and customer account additions.

Actions.description: A set of customer and customer account actions.

Modifications.description: A set of customer and customer account additions.

Action.description: A single customer or customer account action.

IndividualTaxInformation.description: Tax information about the customer required by the IRS. A Form W-9 or W-8 is required for all customers except customers of IB-India. Type deprecated, preferrable to use FormW9 or FormW8.

W9.description: Required for a US citizen or US person including resident alien individual.

W8Ben.description: Required if the beneficial owner is not a US person.

CRS.description: Required if the beneficial owner is part of IB-UK entity.

W8BenE.description: Required if the beneficial owner is not a US entity.

TaxResidencies.description: Tax regulations require us to collect information about customer's tax residency and we may be obligated to share that information with the regulators.

TaxResidency.description: In case of US TIN we must declare the TIN type: it's either SSN or EIN.

FormW8BEN.description: Form number in case broker/advisor sends proprietary blank forms.

FormW9.description: Form number in case broker/advisor sends proprietary blank forms.

FormW8BENE.description: To be set to True if the customer agrees on all items listed in Part XXIX Certification.

SubstantialUsOwners.description: Zero, one or more substantial U.S. Owners of Passive NFFEs (see Part XXX)
Per W-8BEN-E Part XXX: As required by Part XXVI, provide the name, address, and TIN of each substantial U.S. owner of the NFFE. Please see instructions for definition of substantial U.S. owner.

SubstantialUsOwner.description: Identifier for the individual or legal entity at the external entity.

FormW8IMY.description: To be set to True if the customer agrees on all items listed in Part XXVIII Certification.

AcctMgmt.description: Direct actions available on Account Management to modify existing accounts.

Execution.description: Specifies details about execution of the request.

Applications.description: Specifies details about applications belonging to a specific external entity.

Entity.description: External ID associated with the entity.

Errors.description: Specifies error messages when application is not processed successfully via ECA.

Execution.description: Specifies details about execution of the request.

Execution_date.description: Date and time when the client request was processed via ECA.

Process_File.description: Name of the XML file that was processed.

Client.description: Name of the client that submitted the request.

Client_Master_Acct.description: Master Account Id of the client.

Pending_Task.description: Indicates whether task is an online task or not.
